body: LEAD: Navratilova Eliminates Mandlikova: Martina Navratilova advanced yesterday to the final of the New South Wales Open in Sydney, Australia. Catarina Lindqvist of Sweden also moved into today's final with a 5-7,
title: RESULTS PLUS; Tennis
